ygData.subject: Re: Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... These are enhancements?  I think I ll mail these folks a dictionary... I do wish they d implement some sort of linkdead and timestamp check so that if
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 22 Sep 1999, Mike Roach wrote:
>
> General Enhancements
> - Summoned food and water will now disappear when the user logs out.
> - Summoned items will no longer remain indefinitely when placed
> within a bag in the bank.

These are enhancements? I think I'll mail these folks a
dictionary...

I do wish they'd implement some sort of linkdead and timestamp
check so that if you're only linkdead for a few minutes, this
no-rent stuff wouldn't disappear. We've had our party
stranded in Befallen several times due to the no-rent key
disappearing.

> - If the player is under the effect of Minor Illusion, and exits the
> game, upon reentry to the game, the Minor Illusion icon will remain.

This stops an exploit where you could cast minor illusion,
intentionally go linkdead, then come back. You'd still be
illusioned (and thus stuff wouldn't attack you), but because
the client didn't think you were illusioned, you could move.
A needed bugfix, but hardly an enhancement.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
